trans-unit.source: A trigger action that advances a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> to the end of its fill period.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação de gatilho que avança um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> para o final do seu período de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to advance a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to its fill period, if it has one.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill> ação com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> ou um <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> para avançar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> para seu período de preenchimento, se ele tiver um.

trans-unit.source: This action also advances all child <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objects of the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to their fill periods, if they have them.
trans-unit.target: Essa ação também avança todos os filhos <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objetos de destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> para os períodos de preenchimento, se eles existirem.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill> only affects an active <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill> só afeta um ativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> (depois que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> é iniciado).

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Pausar, retomar, parar ou controlar um Storyboard interativamente

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar, retomar ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interativamente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) controlá-lo fazendo referência a seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> não pode ser controlado interativamente depois que ele é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill" />.
